About.Hours & facilities: Open weekdays 10am-4pm; closed weekends. Reference assistance available in person and by mail. Copying services for books, journals, photographs, newspapers, maps and plans.

About.Access: 1 day's advance notice of visit and subject matter required.

About.Acquisition focus: Local European history for Katherine area from 1870 to current. (80% in-house).

About.Major holdings: Katherine Museum: Material relating to overland telegraph 1872- ; World War II 1939-1945; Bush Graves 1870- .
